ygData.subject: Beg Skill Info Request
ygData.msgSnippet: Someone mentioned that it is possible to beg, potentially multiple platnum with a skill over 100.  Well I would really like to know more about this.  I have
ygData.messageBody:
Someone mentioned that it is possible to beg, potentially multiple platnum
with a skill over 100. Well I would really like to know more about this. I
have done some begging between levels 1-5 and I have never been attacked
(some say Im lucky). I have some questions that I would love answers to
before I invest some of my well earned (and mostly unused) practice points
toward. Here are some things I have heard..... confirmation requested.

With a skill over 100 you can beg multiple platnum.

You can beg from NPC, players pets, and monsters.

The Charismatic Carrillion song will help prevent you from getting attacked
by NPC's you beg from.

I would like to know that if this stuff is true, are there trade offs? Is
it worth it?

Please speak up if you know people who beg, or have raised your skill
yourself. I am itching to work on this. I see it as a way to get paid for
playing my songs.

Sevin Tercet 20th Human Bard
and Wanabe Street Musician
on Brell
